1224390.name: OMEGA: The Beginning Soundtrack
1224390.description:
OMEGA: THE BEGINNING (EPISODE I) Original Soundtrack, by Ascari

This sundtrack has been mostly made with Reason Vst synthetizers that beheave like a symphony orchestra. Also, you can hear a touch of a real digital synthetizer, the microKorg, and a trumpet. The sound is crystal clear and cold as digital can be, and it’s especially designed to create an intense atmposphere of suspance, dream, mystery and the typical melancholy of young kids, hovering between joy and loneliness.
1224390.supported_languages: 英语, 意大利语, 德语
